news.title: Private data including criminal records stolen in Legal Aid hack
news.summary: MoJ says data includes addresses, national ID numbers, criminal histories and financial details dating to 2010.

news.title: Olympic gold swimmer left ‘broken’ by coach's harsh regime and weight comments
news.summary: Gold medallist Ruta Meilutytė describes toxic training environment under esteemed trainer Jon Rudd at top swim club.

news.title: Joe Biden diagnosed with 'aggressive' prostate cancer
news.summary: The former US president was diagnosed on Friday after seeing a doctor for urinary symptoms.

news.title: Scientists try to solve mystery of mass dinosaur grave beneath lush Canadian forest
news.summary: A group of researchers have come to Pipestone Creek in Canada to figure out why thousands of dinosaurs are buried here.

news.title: Indian YouTuber arrested for allegedly 'spying' for Pakistan
news.summary: The father of Jyoti Malhotra, the Indian travel influencer, has denied allegations that she was a spy for Pakistan.

news.title: British mountaineer scales Everest for 19th time, breaking own record
news.summary: Kenton Cool has broken his own record for the most climbs up the world's tallest peak by a non-sherpa.

news.title: Water voles are almost extinct in Wales - could edible glitter save them?
news.summary: It is hoped edible glitter could help conservationists to track the shy species in the wild.

news.title: What we know about Biden's prostate cancer diagnosis
news.summary: Prostate cancer is one of the most common cancers affecting men in the US.

news.title: BBC uncovers child sex abuse in South Africa's illegal mines
news.summary: An investigation into the illicit mining sector reveals a world of child exploitation.

news.title: The inside story of a council held to ransom in cyber-attack
news.summary: The BBC investigates one of the most damaging ranswomare attacks on a UK local council.

news.title: Energy price cap: What next for gas and electricity bills and can I fix?
news.summary: Gas and electricity prices are expected to fall in July, under regulator Ofgem's new price cap.

news.title: 'A pain I can't describe': Tornadoes sweep multiple US states
news.summary: Dozens of people have died in parts of the United States after tornadoes caused catastrophic damage across the weekend.

news.title: Annual energy bills predicted to fall £129 in July
news.summary: Domestic energy prices are forecast to fall in July, reversing three consecutive increases in the regulator's price cap.

news.title: Liberal mayor Dan beats nationalist in tense race for Romanian presidency
news.summary: Nicusor Dan fights off a strong challenge from a right-wing nationalist after months of political turbulence.

news.title: GP patients to help NHS find more infected blood victims
news.summary: The NHS is trying to find many hundreds of people exposed to the virus via contaminated blood in the 1970s, 80s and 90s.
